title: Industry Applications
summary: Comprehensive guide to drone applications across major industry sectors

sections.heading: Construction
body: Fortnightly fly-overs to monitor progress and ensure project timelines
3D modeling and photogrammetry for accurate site documentation

sections.heading: Asset Inspection
body: Inspect bridges, communication towers, and assets safely
Detailed visual documentation for maintenance planning

sections.heading: Agriculture
body: Precision application of chemicals to optimize crop yields
NDVI mapping for crop health analysis
Automated field monitoring and data collection

sections.heading: Environmental Mapping
body: 3D modeling of forests and waterways for conservation efforts

sections.heading: Mining and Quarry
body: Safe and fast stockpile volume calculations

sections.heading: Film and TV
body: Establishing shots, tracking shots, and dramatic reveals

faq.q: Which industry has the highest earning potential?
faq.a: Asset inspection and construction typically offer the highest hourly rates, ranging from $160-$400+ per hour for experienced pilots.

faq.q: What equipment is needed for different industries?
faq.a: Equipment requirements vary by industry. Construction may need mapping capabilities, while film requires high-quality cameras. We provide detailed equipment recommendations in your personalized report.
